subject: Urgent: Suspicious Activity Detected
body: We detected a login from a new device. Click here to verify your identity immediately.

subject: Tech Weekly: AI Revolution
body: Top stories: Llama 3 released, NVIDIA stocks soar, Python 3.13 features.

subject: Q3 Report Deadline
body: Hi, I need the Q3 sales report by Friday 5 PM. Please explicitly list the risk factors.

subject: Holiday Policy Update
body: Please review the attached document regarding the new carry-over policy for annual leave.

subject: I have a job for you
body: Are you interested in a new role? Earn $5000/day working from home!

subject: Meeting Request: Phase 2 Kickoff
body: Can we meet next Tuesday at 2 PM to discuss the Phase 2 roadmap? Let me know if that works.
